title: Premiere: Edwin Organ – Janene
body:
Some slightly leftfield, outlandish pop from Glaswegian producer **Edwin Organ** here on new track, _Janene_, seemingly drawing inspiration from the likes of dd elle and Baths.

Purposefully eccentric yet underpinned by some sterling pop sensibilities, it’s a daring step forward for the young musician. Having just played a set at Scotland’s T in the Park festival, and with future releases lined up, it’ll now be interesting to see how Edwin Organ’s sound translates to a larger audience. Check it out below.
